Title: Relates to ethics reform
Summary: Relates to ethics reform, term limits on certain positions in the legislature, limits on campaign contributions, directing stare funds, and creating a database of state contracts.
LawCode: Amd §74, Pub Off L; add §§5-c & 33-a, Leg L; add §14-115, amd §14-114, El L; add §204, Exec L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public officers law, the legislative law, the election law and the executive law, in relation to ethics reform
